sql.if:
order by
t.user_id asc
t.user_id desc
t.user_name asc
t.user_name desc
t.password asc
t.password desc
t.disable_date asc
t.disable_date desc
t.full_name asc
t.full_name desc
t.gender asc
t.gender desc
t.email_address asc
t.email_address desc
t.mobile asc
t.mobile desc
t.nickname asc
t.nickname desc
t.email_alias asc
t.email_alias desc
t.timezone asc
t.timezone desc
t.country asc
t.country desc
t.language asc
t.language desc
t.attribute1 asc
t.attribute1 desc
t.attribute2 asc
t.attribute2 desc
t.attribute3 asc
t.attribute3 desc
t.attribute4 asc
t.attribute4 desc
t.attribute5 asc
t.attribute5 desc
t.created_by asc
t.created_by desc
t.creation_date asc
t.creation_date desc
t.last_updated_by asc
t.last_updated_by desc
t.last_update_date asc
t.last_update_date desc
t.ldap_id asc
t.ldap_id desc
t.ldap_sync_flag asc
t.ldap_sync_flag desc
t.ldap_sync_dt asc
t.ldap_sync_dt desc
t.extenal_user_flag asc
t.extenal_user_flag desc
t.user_type asc
t.user_type desc
t.emp_status asc
t.emp_status desc
t.emp_num asc
t.emp_num desc
t.org_code asc
t.org_code desc
t.enu_name asc
t.enu_name desc
t.primary_position_id asc
t.primary_position_id desc

mapper.select:
select t.* from auth_user t
limit 1
mapper.update: update auth_user t set t.user_name=#{userName} ,t.password=#{password} ,t.disable_date=#{disableDate} ,t.full_name=#{fullName} ,t.gender=#{gender} ,t.email_address=#{emailAddress} ,t.mobile=#{mobile} ,t.nickname=#{nickname} ,t.email_alias=#{emailAlias} ,t.timezone=#{timezone} ,t.country=#{country} ,t.language=#{language} ,t.attribute1=#{attribute1} ,t.attribute2=#{attribute2} ,t.attribute3=#{attribute3} ,t.attribute4=#{attribute4} ,t.attribute5=#{attribute5} ,t.last_updated_by=#{lastUpdatedBy} ,t.last_update_date=now() ,t.ldap_id=#{ldapId} ,t.ldap_sync_flag=#{ldapSyncFlag} ,t.ldap_sync_dt=#{ldapSyncDt} ,t.extenal_user_flag=#{extenalUserFlag} ,t.user_type=#{userType} ,t.emp_status=#{empStatus} ,t.emp_num=#{empNum} ,t.org_code=#{orgCode} ,t.enu_name=#{enuName} ,t.primary_position_id=#{primaryPositionId} where t.user_id=#{userId}

update auth_user t set t.user_id=#{userId} ,t.user_name=#{userName} ,t.password=#{password} ,t.disable_date=#{disableDate} ,t.full_name=#{fullName} ,t.gender=#{gender} ,t.email_address=#{emailAddress} ,t.mobile=#{mobile} ,t.nickname=#{nickname} ,t.email_alias=#{emailAlias} ,t.timezone=#{timezone} ,t.country=#{country} ,t.language=#{language} ,t.attribute1=#{attribute1} ,t.attribute2=#{attribute2} ,t.attribute3=#{attribute3} ,t.attribute4=#{attribute4} ,t.attribute5=#{attribute5} ,t.last_updated_by=#{lastUpdatedBy} ,t.last_update_date=now() ,t.ldap_id=#{ldapId} ,t.ldap_sync_flag=#{ldapSyncFlag} ,t.ldap_sync_dt=#{ldapSyncDt} ,t.extenal_user_flag=#{extenalUserFlag} ,t.user_type=#{userType} ,t.emp_status=#{empStatus} ,t.emp_num=#{empNum} ,t.org_code=#{orgCode} ,t.enu_name=#{enuName} ,t.primary_position_id=#{primaryPositionId} where t.user_id=#{userId}

update auth_user t set t.user_name=#{userName} ,t.password=#{password} ,t.disable_date=#{disableDate} ,t.full_name=#{fullName} ,t.gender=#{gender} ,t.email_address=#{emailAddress} ,t.mobile=#{mobile} ,t.nickname=#{nickname} ,t.email_alias=#{emailAlias} ,t.timezone=#{timezone} ,t.country=#{country} ,t.language=#{language} ,t.attribute1=#{attribute1} ,t.attribute2=#{attribute2} ,t.attribute3=#{attribute3} ,t.attribute4=#{attribute4} ,t.attribute5=#{attribute5} ,t.last_updated_by=#{lastUpdatedBy} ,t.last_update_date=now() ,t.ldap_id=#{ldapId} ,t.ldap_sync_flag=#{ldapSyncFlag} ,t.ldap_sync_dt=#{ldapSyncDt} ,t.extenal_user_flag=#{extenalUserFlag} ,t.user_type=#{userType} ,t.emp_status=#{empStatus} ,t.emp_num=#{empNum} ,t.org_code=#{orgCode} ,t.enu_name=#{enuName} ,t.primary_position_id=#{primaryPositionId} where t.user_id=#{userId} and t.last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate}

update auth_user t set t.user_id=#{userId} ,t.user_name=#{userName} ,t.password=#{password} ,t.disable_date=#{disableDate} ,t.full_name=#{fullName} ,t.gender=#{gender} ,t.email_address=#{emailAddress} ,t.mobile=#{mobile} ,t.nickname=#{nickname} ,t.email_alias=#{emailAlias} ,t.timezone=#{timezone} ,t.country=#{country} ,t.language=#{language} ,t.attribute1=#{attribute1} ,t.attribute2=#{attribute2} ,t.attribute3=#{attribute3} ,t.attribute4=#{attribute4} ,t.attribute5=#{attribute5} ,t.last_updated_by=#{lastUpdatedBy} ,t.last_update_date=now() ,t.ldap_id=#{ldapId} ,t.ldap_sync_flag=#{ldapSyncFlag} ,t.ldap_sync_dt=#{ldapSyncDt} ,t.extenal_user_flag=#{extenalUserFlag} ,t.user_type=#{userType} ,t.emp_status=#{empStatus} ,t.emp_num=#{empNum} ,t.org_code=#{orgCode} ,t.enu_name=#{enuName} ,t.primary_position_id=#{primaryPositionId} where t.user_id=#{userId} and t.last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate}

update.foreach: update auth_user t set t.user_name=#{obj.userName} ,t.password=#{obj.password} ,t.disable_date=#{obj.disableDate} ,t.full_name=#{obj.fullName} ,t.gender=#{obj.gender} ,t.email_address=#{obj.emailAddress} ,t.mobile=#{obj.mobile} ,t.nickname=#{obj.nickname} ,t.email_alias=#{obj.emailAlias} ,t.timezone=#{obj.timezone} ,t.country=#{obj.country} ,t.language=#{obj.language} ,t.attribute1=#{obj.attribute1} ,t.attribute2=#{obj.attribute2} ,t.attribute3=#{obj.attribute3} ,t.attribute4=#{obj.attribute4} ,t.attribute5=#{obj.attribute5} ,t.last_updated_by=#{obj.lastUpdatedBy} ,t.last_update_date=now() ,t.ldap_id=#{obj.ldapId} ,t.ldap_sync_flag=#{obj.ldapSyncFlag} ,t.ldap_sync_dt=#{obj.ldapSyncDt} ,t.extenal_user_flag=#{obj.extenalUserFlag} ,t.user_type=#{obj.userType} ,t.emp_status=#{obj.empStatus} ,t.emp_num=#{obj.empNum} ,t.org_code=#{obj.orgCode} ,t.enu_name=#{obj.enuName} ,t.primary_position_id=#{obj.primaryPositionId} where t.user_id=#{obj.userId}

update auth_user t set t.user_id=#{obj.userId} ,t.user_name=#{obj.userName} ,t.password=#{obj.password} ,t.disable_date=#{obj.disableDate} ,t.full_name=#{obj.fullName} ,t.gender=#{obj.gender} ,t.email_address=#{obj.emailAddress} ,t.mobile=#{obj.mobile} ,t.nickname=#{obj.nickname} ,t.email_alias=#{obj.emailAlias} ,t.timezone=#{obj.timezone} ,t.country=#{obj.country} ,t.language=#{obj.language} ,t.attribute1=#{obj.attribute1} ,t.attribute2=#{obj.attribute2} ,t.attribute3=#{obj.attribute3} ,t.attribute4=#{obj.attribute4} ,t.attribute5=#{obj.attribute5} ,t.last_updated_by=#{obj.lastUpdatedBy} ,t.last_update_date=now() ,t.ldap_id=#{obj.ldapId} ,t.ldap_sync_flag=#{obj.ldapSyncFlag} ,t.ldap_sync_dt=#{obj.ldapSyncDt} ,t.extenal_user_flag=#{obj.extenalUserFlag} ,t.user_type=#{obj.userType} ,t.emp_status=#{obj.empStatus} ,t.emp_num=#{obj.empNum} ,t.org_code=#{obj.orgCode} ,t.enu_name=#{obj.enuName} ,t.primary_position_id=#{obj.primaryPositionId} where t.user_id=#{obj.userId}

delete.foreach: delete t from auth_user t where t.user_id=#{obj.userId}
